>>> etc/portage/make.profile -> ../../overlay/profiles/default

>>> overlay/profiles/default/parent
../1
../2

>>> overlay/profiles/1/make.defaults
USE=a

>>> overlay/profiles/1/package.use
pkg/x -a

>>> overlay/profiles/2/make.defaults
SAVED_USE=$USE
# $USE is "a" here, but it is not considered for the final value computation.

>>> overlay/profiles/categories
pkg

>>> overlay/pkg/x/x-1.ebuild
EAPI=7
SLOT=0
KEYWORDS="*"
IUSE=a

>>> expect.use
pkg/x -a

>>> expect.vars
SAVED_USE="a"
